sections: If you can't be at the GAA auction in person, you don't have to miss the action! Learn how to watch live, and bid here.
With the year cooling down, the November
is only heating up! For the next few days, some of the
will exchange hands, and Motorious is front and center to bring you the results, the stories, and imagery that will put you in the moment.

From now until Saturday, 650 cars will go up for sale, and we fully expect to see some record breaking bids. There are special collections being featured, and there is truly something for everyone. If you browse our site, you’ll see that we’ve already been hard at work publishing the highlights ahead of the auction, and are now on the floor.
As you would expect with such a large docket, bidding happens fast, and these cars are snatched up by brokers and individual buyers who are looking for their next toy, or an investment.
The GAA November 2019 auction is now underway and you can join in on the action now by catching the livestream:

“Unable to attend GAA Classic Cars auction in person?  You don’t have to miss a minute of the action, simply watch live online!  All three days of auction activity are live and available to you via YouTube."
You can also join in on the bidding by phone and online here if you can’t make it to the event in person, but want to bring one of the many cars home.
. To bid by phone, fill out the registration packet and email it into the address in the link. To make online bids, you will be redirected to the online bidding platform Proxibid.
“Being a bidder at GAA Classic Cars give you access to a first class selection of vehicles and a bidding experience that is unique in the Classic Car arena.”
Check back with us throughout the weekend.
